features: 【Mini Flexible Phone & Camera Tripod with Remote】UURIG phone & camera tripod adopts upgraded structure design,equipped with wireless remote control, it allows you to take photos or videos from a long distance (Support 10 m / 33 ft) on iOS and Android phones.On top of the selfie stick tripod, use a universal 1/4" screw,can be used with DSLR, SLR, action camera, webcam and GoPro.Perfect for selfies,live broadcasts,video recording,Vlog,travel and family gatherings.（Includes GoPro Adapter)

【360° Rotate Ball Head Phone Tripod】UURIG portable selfie stick tripod adopts 360° rotatable degree universal ball head design.You can adjust various angles to shoot(horizontal shooting, vertical shooting, low-angle shooting, high-angle shooting)Tighten the knob adjustment on the ball head, you can lock to a certain fixed angle.Let you capture the most perfect shots and record the wonderful moments in your life.

【Cold Shoe & Bendable Tripod Legs】Our Phone Tripod Legs are made of durable silicone material. It has good durability, softness, comfortable touch.The bendable legs can be twisted into any shape internally as needed, you can wrap it around bike,railing, branch or chair. At just 11.8 inches tall and weighing 260 grams, it fits perfectly in your suitcase or backpack.There are 1 cold shoe on the phone clip, you can use to install the LED fill light and microphone to improve your video quality.

【High Quality & Compatibility】UURIG tripod for iphone are made of aluminum alloy, nylon fiber and silicone materials, which are resistant to compression and breakage.Strong and Durable.The bottom of the GoPro tripods has a rubber base, which makes the tripod more stable.Suitable for iOS and Android, such as iPhone 14/13/12 Pro Max/Samsung Galaxy S10/S9/S8 Plus, and most other smartphones. You can also use it on Canon Nikon Sony camera/GoPro/webcam/any device with a 1/4 inch nut.

【Worry-free Shopping Experience】UURIG team is dedicated to 100% customer satisfaction.If you have any quality problems with your 2 in 1 phone&camera tripod. Please contact us and we will offer you a full refund or replacement. We will resolve your issue within 24 hours and provide you with a perfect professional after-sales service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and Versatile
reviews.reviewText: I got the 22inch phone camera tripod. I love this thing. I had a lot of boxes to check and it does them all. Compared it with three other tripods and this one won:Compact, lightweight to fit in a mini backpack.Dont need super long reach. Just enough for a selfie stick, and to not be a low shot for full body tripod photos.Phone adapter easy to remove without much fuss.Complete 360 rotationAble to tilt forward 90 degrees for down shots, AND able to fully rotate the phone holder to tilt 90 degrees backwards. (For front and back camera)Holds phone closer to center point instead of bottom.Has a bottom support for under your phoneAble to tighten phone holder for security and peace of mind.Holds phone on vertical and landscape in CENTER of the stick for max stability.Stable, doesn't wobble.Small tripod circumference.Comes with a Bluetooth remote that has a keychain loop!! (I haven't tested it yet.)Honestly it's almost perfect. I think the only issue is you have to pull pretty hard to open the tripod legs. But that also means that because there's resistance, you won't accidentally catch your fingers when you close them. So I'll take it.As long as nothing breaks I think this is fantastic. I can't wait to use this on my trip, and all future trips!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. For the price you cant beat that. I bought it to start vlogging w my camera. Which I can switch between that & my iPhone.So Durable and versatile usage!My only issue was that it didnt come w instructions. And it took a sec or 1000 secs to realize you have to unscrew the orange cap to release the handle into full stand. Yea someone w no patience like me would've broke it eventually. But the common sense of noticing that it loosened from twisting it resolved that sooner than later. TG! Lol. The remote included sometimes connects to pictures on 3rd party apps and sometimes it doesn’t. Ig it was meant for main usage on phones camera. Idk. The app seems outdated for the remote. But It was an extra that im not too concerned about.Other than that small idiotic moment. Decent purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing! Compact, great price
reviews.reviewText: Love it overall out of the package. Have not had real world use yet, but quality of construction gives me confidence. I absolutely love the sleek design of the phone holder that folds down. Looking at the previous reviews I'm a little disappointed that they transitioned over to solid legs versus the flexible ones. I can see it being very useful on unleveled ground. The remote is super easy to use and pairs very quickly to Bluetooth. There are no directions and I wish they would have at least had the pictures that were on here for directions. The phone holder is super sleek and awesome but not exactly intuitive without some directions.I bought the eucos at the same time to compare. It has the exact same feet and telescopic construction. In fact it feels like the exact same product aside from the attachment to hold the phone. Eucos has a screw on phone holder attachment. Secure, but inconvenient to use. The spring that this one has is definitely the way to go. The eucos goes to 62 in instead of this one that goes to 52. Makes me feel like this one could have been that tall as well. It also has a built-in holder for the remote. However when it comes down to it, the slick phone holder, level, ball adjustment wins out.If this was just minor improvements like being a little taller, flexible legs, and remote holder it would be a 6 star product. I like it a lot and will update my review as I use it more and have a better feel for it. At this price, it's worth a shot to try

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I like it, but its missing a part
reviews.reviewText: UURIG 52" Extendable Camera Tripod for Insta360 X3 X2 Selfie Stick Tripod with 1/4" Screw Mini Portable Camera Stand Tripod for GoPro Max Hero 11 10 9 8 7 6 5/DJI Osmo/AKASO/SJCAM/Action Camera. I like it very much. Everything I bought it for: lightweight, collapses small enough to fit in my laptop bag. Except I did not get the GoPro adapter as stated on the product page. The description does say it is "for GoPro Max Hero," which sort of implies that I have to have my own, but scroll down and it states that the adapter is included. I don't want to return for an exchange afraid I will just get another without the adapter. For the life of me, I cannot figure out how to contact the seller to tell them it did not come with the part. If it is not supposed to come with the adapter, then the product page is wrong. Love the product though. Wish I knew how to contact the seller.
The tripod is great for taking slo-motion videos or very good still photos.

reviews.reviewTitle: Versatile and lightweight. Perfect for traveling
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this for an upcoming trip as I will be taking photos and videos with both my cell phone and GoPro. Though it’s made of plastic, it feels very solid and the light weight makes it easy to handle. The ball-head makes it very adjustable and the built-in cell phone clamp with cold-shoe on the top and extra cold-shoe on the side provides extra mounting points for accessories such as microphones and lights. There is a bubble-level built-in but it’s placement along the bottom edge of the clamp makes it difficult to see. The spread of the tripod legs is adjustable which is handy for smaller surfaces. Overall, this is a very versatile portable tripod that I am looking forward to try out during my travels.
Worked great would of liked a little more weight in the handle so when it’s fully extended it’s more balanced other than that it was great used it on beach walk fully extended

reviews.reviewTitle: A solid tripod for live streaming
reviews.reviewText: This tripod is very functional for my online class and Zoom meetings as I can attach a webcam onto it, rather than using the native camera from a laptop. The size is correct and the built quality seems to last for the years to come.
